name: Ext_R3_CompartmentDefinition_jurisdiction
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.CompartmentDefinition.jurisdiction for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents CompartmentDefinition.jurisdiction from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CompartmentDefinition|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Intended jurisdiction for compartment definition (if applicable)
element.definition: A legal or geographic region in which the compartment definition is intended to be used.
element.comment: Mapping of FHIR R3:CompartmentDefinition element `CompartmentDefinition.jurisdiction` to R4:CompartmentDefinition element ``

element.short: Intended jurisdiction for compartment definition (if applicable)
element.definition: A legal or geographic region in which the compartment definition is intended to be used.
element.comment: Mapping of FHIR R3:CompartmentDefinition element `CompartmentDefinition.jurisdiction` to R4:CompartmentDefinition element ``

binding.description: Countries and regions within which this artifact is targeted for use
